ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported
0 = Neutral / No instruction; 1 = Maintain; 2 = Decrease; 777 = Baseline / No instruction

ElementDescription: I tried to hold back or suppress my emotional reactions
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time

ElementDescription: I didn't mind feeling uncomfortable during the task
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time

ElementDescription: I tried to think about the events depicted in the task in a way that would make me feel less distress (e.g. reminding myself it was fake)
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time

ElementDescription: I just let myself experience whatever emotions came up during the task
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time

ElementDescription: I distracted myself during the task (e.g. thought about other things)
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time

ElementDescription: I was interested in getting drawn into the task really experiencing it
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time

ElementDescription: I focused on the less emotional details of the task or shifted my gaze when I thougth I might see something upsetting
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time

ElementDescription: I reocgnized what I was feeling during the task but didn't try to change what I was feeling
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 2 = Rarely; 4/5 = Occasionally; 7 = Often; 8 = All the time
1 = baseline; 2 = after neutral prompt; 3 = after first unpleaseant prompt; 4 = after second unpleasant prompt
